name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The most advanced iPhone ever with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and the most powerful camera system. Experience unprecedented performance with the latest iOS features and enhanced battery life.

name: MacBook Air M3
description: Supercharged by the M3 chip, the 13-inch MacBook Air is incredibly fast and delivers exceptional battery life. Perfect for work, creativity, and everything in between.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Inspired by two iconic Air Max shoes, the Air Max 270 delivers visible cushioning under every step. The large Max Air unit provides all-day comfort and style.

name: Levi's 501 Original Jeans
description: The original blue jean since 1873. A vintage-inspired fit that's roomy through the thigh with a straight leg. Made with premium denim for lasting quality.

name: Dyson V15 Detect
description: The most powerful, intelligent cordless vacuum. Reveals invisible dust with laser detection and adapts suction power automatically. Up to 60 minutes of runtime.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: Professional-grade performance meets timeless design. 10 speeds and multiple attachments make this mixer perfect for any culinary challenge.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with exceptional sound quality. 30-hour battery life and crystal-clear hands-free calling make these headphones perfect for any lifestyle.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 23
description: Our most responsive running shoe ever. BOOST midsole technology returns energy with every step, while the Primeknit upper provides adaptive support.

name: iPad Air M2
description: Powerful, colorful, and wonderfully versatile. iPad Air is designed to help you create, stay connected, and get things done. Now with the M2 chip for incredible performance.

name: Ralph Lauren Polo Shirt
description: Classic fit polo shirt in premium cotton mesh. Features the iconic embroidered pony logo and ribbed collar. A timeless wardrobe essential.

name: Instant Pot Pro Plus
description: 11-in-1 electric pressure cooker with advanced features. Cook faster, retain more flavor, and enjoy hands-free cooking with 800+ built-in smart programs.

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Enhanced gaming experience with a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen. Play at home or on the go with enhanced audio and improved kickstand design.
